name: InvinitoVOX
description:
Monsters are coming!

Fight different creatures in the open arena.

Upgrade your character and upgrade your weapons.

Compete with your friends for the top levels!

The game is made in voxel graphics.

Improvement of the characteristics of the character is made by choosing a random card.

- 14 types of weapons.

- 15 kinds of monsters.

In future updates there will be skins, new maps, a system of rewards for daily tasks.
